io.github.splotycode.mosaik.database.connection

Interface Connection<T extends Connection>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - this type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnection, AbstractSQLConnection, MariaSQlConnection, MongoConnection, MySQLConnection, OracleConnection, SQLDriverConnection

    public interface Connection<T extends Connection>
    Symbolises a Database Connection
